decks.notes: The deck focuses on quickly establishing a board presence with efficient creatures like Walking Ballista and Verdurous Gearhulk, supported by cards like Winding Constrictor and Rishkar, Peema Renegade to generate extra value and counters. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a steady stream of threats while also maintaining card advantage through cards like Glint-Sleeve Siphoner and Jadelight Ranger. Removal spells like Vraska's Contempt and Ravenous Chupacabra help to clear the way for attacks and keep the opponent's board in check.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game by countering opponent's spells, removing threats from the board, and drawing cards to maintain card advantage. The deck aims to stall the game until it can cast powerful control finishers like Torrential Gearhulk and Teferi, Hero of Dominaria to close out the game. The inclusion of cards like Search for Azcanta and Glimmer of Genius helps the deck filter through cards to find the necessary answers to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The mana base is optimized to ensure consistent access to all necessary colors of mana.

The main concept of this deck is to control and manipulate the board with creatures like Seekers' Squire, Ravenous Chupacabra, and Champion of Wits, while using cards like Hostage Taker and Kitesail Freebooter to disrupt your opponent's strategy. The deck also aims to quickly fill up the graveyard with creatures using Minister of Inquiries and Stitcher's Supplier in order to activate Gate to the Afterlife and bring back powerful creatures with God-Pharaoh's Gift. The combination of control elements and graveyard recursion makes this deck a versatile and formidable opponent in a Standard 1 vs 1 format.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game through ramping up mana quickly with green spells and then using powerful control cards to dominate the board. The deck focuses on powerful spells like Hour of Devastation and Hour of Promise to clear threats, while also utilizing cards like Thaumatic Compass to search for key lands. By combining ramp and control elements, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with its powerful late-game threats like Sifter Wurm.

The deck focuses on controlling the game by countering opponent's spells and removing threats with burn spells. It also utilizes card draw and card filtering to maintain card advantage. Teferi, Hero of Dominaria provides card advantage and control, while Torrential Gearhulk allows you to reuse powerful instants. Whirler Virtuoso provides blockers and energy generation. The mana base is carefully constructed to ensure consistent access to all colors needed for the spells. Ultimately, the deck aims to outlast the opponent and win through incremental advantage.

This deck centers around using God-Pharaoh's Gift to gain control over the board by repeatedly bringing back powerful creatures from the graveyard. It utilizes cards like Strategic Planning, Refurbish, and Champion of Wits to quickly fill the graveyard with targets for revival. With Fumigate for board wipes and Search for Azcanta for card advantage, this deck aims to outvalue and outlast opponents through a combination of control elements and reanimation strategies.

This Grixis aggro deck focuses on using powerful creatures like The Scarab God, Nicol Bolas, and Whirler Virtuoso to quickly push damage through to the opponent. It also includes control elements like Vraska's Contempt and Supreme Will to disrupt the opponent's plans. The deck features a mix of removal spells and card draw to maintain card advantage and keep up the pressure. The mana base is designed to support the deck's three-color requirements, with a mix of dual lands and utility lands to ensure consistency in casting spells.

This mono black aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with a swarm of undead creatures. By utilizing a mix of low cost creatures like Diregraf Ghoul and Dread Wanderer, along with powerful lords like Death Baron and Lord of the Accursed, the deck aims to deal damage fast and efficiently. The inclusion of removal spells like Fatal Push and Vraska's Contempt help to clear the way for your creatures to attack, while cards like Liliana's Mastery provide a late game boost to your army of zombies.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly and aggressively deal damage to the opponent using direct damage spells and efficient creatures. By maximizing the use of burn spells like Shock, Lightning Strike, and Wizard's Lightning, combined with creatures like Viashino Pyromancer and Goblin Chainwhirler, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent before they can stabilize. The inclusion of The Flame of Keld helps to maintain a steady stream of damage output, while cards like Soul-Scar Mage and Earthshaker Khenra provide additional utility and threats to further pressure the opponent.

The main focus of this Mono Green Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and efficient lineup of creatures. By utilizing cards like Steel Leaf Champion and Ghalta, Primal Hunger, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early on and maintain that momentum throughout the game. With strong creatures, removal spells like Thrashing Brontodon, and protective spells like Blossoming Defense, the deck is designed to quickly build up a threatening board presence and close out the game before the opponent can establish a solid defense.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize aggressive creatures and burn spells to quickly deal damage to the opponent. By combining powerful creatures like Glorybringer and Nicol Bolas, the Ravager with efficient removal spells like Abrade and Unlicensed Disintegration, the deck aims to control the board and maintain pressure on the opponent. Additionally, the deck includes cards like Chandra, Torch of Defiance and The Scarab God for additional value and card advantage. With a mix of creatures, burn spells, and removal, the Grixis Aggro deck seeks to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory.

This deck focuses on maintaining a balance between aggression and control by utilizing powerful creatures like Nicol Bolas, the Ravager and The Scarab God, along with disruptive spells like Fatal Push and Vraska's Contempt. By efficiently managing resources and controlling the board with removal spells, the deck aims to apply pressure on the opponent while also disrupting their game plan. The inclusion of versatile cards like Liliana, Death's Majesty and Champion of Wits provides additional value and flexibility in different game situations.

The deck focuses on stalling the opponent's aggression through counterspells and removal spells while generating card advantage with Teferi, Hero of Dominaria and Pull from Tomorrow. It aims to control the board with cards like Settle the Wreckage and Seal Away while digging for answers with Search for Azcanta. The deck also has a win condition through Teferi's ultimate ability or decking the opponent out with card advantage. Overall, the strategy revolves around keeping the opponent's threats in check and outvaluing them in the long game.

This deck focuses on quickly building a board presence with aggressive creatures like Knight of Grace and Knight of Malice, supported by cards like History of Benalia and Benalish Marshal. The deck also includes removal spells like Fatal Push and Cast Out to control the opponent's board. Ajani, Adversary of Tyrants provides additional support by buffing creatures and reanimating fallen allies. The key strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with efficient creatures and powerful synergies to quickly end the game in your favor.

The key strategy of this Dimir Control deck is to control the game by disrupting opponents' plays with counter spells, removal, and hand disruption while building card advantage through cards like Glimmer of Genius and Search for Azcanta. It aims to control the board with removal spells like Fatal Push and Vraska's Contempt, while also utilizing powerful creatures like The Scarab God and Torrential Gearhulk to close out the game. The deck focuses on maintaining control of the game through a combination of card advantage, disruption, and powerful threats to secure victory.

The deck focuses on quickly deploying low-cost aggressive creatures to overwhelm the opponent with a wide board presence. Key cards include Angel of Invention for buffing the team, Knight of Grace for protection against black spells, and Oketra's Monument for mana production and token generation. The inclusion of Suncleanser and Remorseful Cleric helps deal with graveyard strategies, while cards like Mentor of the Meek provide card draw to maintain momentum. The deck also includes removal spells like Dusk / Dawn and Field of Ruin for additional utility. Overall, the strategy is to flood the battlefield with efficient creatures and push for a fast victory.
